captive_portal.visit_to_begin: Visit the following URL in your browser to begin:

env_config.env_rules: Environment variable keys should start with a letter and only contain letters, digits and underscores
env_config.env_var_warning_message: Adding or removing environment variables will restart the services on this device!
env_config.restarting_containers: Your containers need to restart. The user interface will be unavailable until they come back online.

file_manager.invalid_upload_string: Entries contain an invalid name and will not be uploaded. The following characters are not compatible: '/', '\0'
file_manager.invalid_filemanager_string: You entered an invalid name. The following characters are not compatible: '/', '\0'
file_manager.name: Name
file_manager.upload_files_exist: Some of the files you added already exist. These files will be overwritten.

configure_password.invalid_password_length: Password must be 8 characters or more.
configure_password.password_set: Password set. If you are running a hotspot, it will restart.

configure_ssid.ssid_set: SSID set. If you are running a hotspot, it will restart.

connect.connection_request: Your device will now try to connect to the network. If it is not available in a minute, reconnect to the device and check your password is correct.
connect.invalid_password_length: Password must be 8 characters or more.
connect.network_connect_fail: Failed to execute the connect request.
connect.network_fetch_fail: Failed to fetch the available networks.
connect.network_forget_fail: Failed to execute the forget request.
connect.refresh_not_compatible: Your device requires a restart to refresh the list.
connect.already_connected: You are already connected to WiFi.

errors.no_backend: Unable to communicate with the backend service

network.network_connection_down: You are no longer connected to a network. Try reconnecting to your device.
network.no_wifi_api: Failed to communicate with Balena Py Wi-Fi Connect. Is it installed on this device?

pwa.install_notification: Did you know you can install this page as an app and use it offline?
pwa.install_instructions_safari: - Safari: Press the 'Share' button and select 'Add to Home Screen'
pwa.install_instructions_chrome: - Chrome Android: Press the 'three dot' icon in the upper right to open the menu. Select 'Add to Home screen'.
pwa.install_instructions_browsers: - Google Chrome and Microsoft Edge: Click the icon on the right side of the URL bar then click the 'Install' button, or install from the 'three dot' menu.
